verbose_text: Nevertheless, as Martinez et al. XREF_BIBR and Beyer et al. XREF_BIBR demonstrated that P2RY12 expression is induced in human macrophages upon GM-CSF or M-CSF stimulation, we tested GM-CSF and M-CSF (in a concentration of 100 ng/mL) after 48 h in the presence or absence of LPS (10 ng/mL) or rIL4 (20 ng/mL).
